dataset.description: All businesses that apply for an assumed name business license will be listed in this dataset. It will be updated on a quarterly basis and has data going back to 1990.
dataset.title: Assumed Name Business Licenses

dataset.description:
The checkbook summaries located below are copies of the Claims and Officers report presented to and approved by the County Board each meeting. This means the reports run one month behind. For example, if you are looking for January 2012 information, you would have to check the February 2012 Claims and Officers Report.

These reports have a variety of information on them. They include a monthly summary of expenses by line item, various revenue reports, salary information and beginning in December 2013, a listing of the checkbook from the General fund.

Some reports are not on file. For those months that the report can not be partially recreated a note of (Not on file) is placed after the month. If part of the report could be recreated, a note of (Partial) is placed after the month.
dataset.title: Monthly Board Checkbook Summaries

dataset.description:
Created by Macoupin County Archives volunteers, this index of cases from 1839-sometime in the 1840s. 

For a copy of a death certificate, please submit a request to the following
Circuit Clerk Research
P.O. Box 197
Carlinville, IL 62626

Requests can take 30-60 days to be fulfilled. Costs are 5 dollars.
dataset.title: Circuit Clerk Book A Index

dataset.description: All County Audit reports filed with the County Clerk's office are available in this dataset.
dataset.title: Audits

dataset.description: All County plats and surveys recorded before 2008 are linked in this dataset.
dataset.title: Plats & Surveys

dataset.description: This dataset shows the total turnout as well as the vote counts for the two major parties in Macoupin County from 1936 to 2016. The national winner is listed first in the Election field.
dataset.title: Presidential Election Results And Turnout 1936-2016

dataset.description: Starting in late 2008, the Animal Control Administrator submits a report to the County Board showing data such as the number of adoptions done each month or how many calls the administrator is called out on. This dataset includes links to copies of the pdf reports the Animal Control administrator submits to the Board. The previous month's data is provided in each month's report submitted to the Board.
dataset.title: Animal Control Monthly Board Reports

dataset.description: All resolutions adopted by the County Board are available in this dataset.
dataset.title: Resolutions

dataset.description: All maps, permits, applications and various documents filed with the County Clerk's office from the Illinois Department of Natural Resources regarding mines in Macoupin County.
dataset.title: Macoupin Mine Maps and Documents

dataset.description: A history of voter registration and turnout at each election from 1986 to 2018
dataset.title: Voter Registration and Turnout

dataset.description: This dataset shows the total turnout as well as the vote counts for the two major parties in Macoupin County from 1938 to 2018. The statewide winner is listed first in the Election field.
dataset.title: Midterm Election Turnout and Governor Results 1978-2018

dataset.description: This dataset includes links to all County Board approved contracts as well as any contracts Elected Officials or Department heads have opted to put online.
dataset.title: County Contracts

dataset.description: Foreclosures recorded with the Macoupin County Recorder of Deeds. Data covers 2015. All documents recorded under the document type 'LP' are listed. Please visit http://macoupincountyil.gov/county_clerk_remote.htm for remote access to the full index of recorded documents and print copies.
dataset.title: Recorded Foreclosures - 2015

dataset.description: Any Election, there is under voting in which more people vote in one particular race than another. This dataset includes over 30 years of primary elections and shows a countywide race versus a statewide or congressional race and the total number of undervotes.
dataset.title: 30 Year Analysis Of Macoupin Voters Undervoting In Primary Elections

dataset.description: Every two years, voters must pull either a Democratic or Republican ballot. This dataset shows the number of voters pulling each party ballot going back to 1938.
dataset.title: Party Ballots Pulled Per Primary

dataset.description: In 2019, state law was changed to make any military discharge that had been recorded for more than 62 years available to the public. As a service to military members and their families, Macoupin County has this index of every discharge filed 62 years or longer available online. Anyone wishing to request a copy can find a request form at http://macoupincountyclerk.com/county_clerk_s_office/military_discharge_records.php. There is no charge for a copy of the record.
dataset.title: Military Discharges

dataset.description: This data includes the GIS data for the 61 precincts in Macoupin County.
dataset.title: Macoupin Precincts GIS Data

dataset.description: Dataset that powers:  http://payroll.macoupincountyil.gov/
dataset.title: Macoupin County - Payroll

dataset.description: Budget for 1997-2014.
dataset.title: Macoupin County Budget

dataset.description: Numerous boards and districts have their membership approved by the County Board. This dataset includes a list of all appointments made by the County Board, which district they were appointed to as well as when their term expires.
dataset.title: County Board Appointments

dataset.description: A listing of each precinct's polling place with physical address.
dataset.title: Polling Places

dataset.description: A look at yearly number of case filings per court case types. Going back to 2006 and updated yearly.
dataset.title: Yearly Court Case Filing Statistics

dataset.description: In 2006, Illinois started early voting before Election Day. Since then, more and more voters are voting early. This dataset includes stats of how many voters cast their ballot early, how many voted by mail, how many military voters voted, etc.
dataset.title: Early, Mail and Grace Period Voting

dataset.description: A listing of all vendors used by the County that are processed through the County Clerk and Treasurer offices.
dataset.title: Vendor dataset

dataset.description: for http://checkbook.macoupincountyil.gov/
dataset.title: Macoupin County: Open Expenditures Ledger

dataset.description: Mortgages recorded with the Macoupin County Recorder of Deeds. Data covers 2015. All documents recorded under the document type 'MTG' are listed. Please visit http://macoupincountyil.gov/county_clerk_remote.htm for remote access to the full index of recorded documents and print copies.
dataset.title: Recorded Mortgages - 2015

dataset.description: This data includes the GIS data for the school districts in Macoupin County.
dataset.title: Macoupin School District GIS Data

dataset.description: Quit Claim Deeds recorded with the Macoupin County Recorder of Deeds. Data covers 2015. All documents recorded under the document type 'QCD' are listed. Please visit http://macoupincountyil.gov/county_clerk_remote.htm for remote access to the full index of recorded documents and print copies.
dataset.title: Recorded Quit Claim Deeds - 2015
